data.text: @scottdavidherr OH the latest average is about to stop dropping? It might go slightly back up but not much.
@scottdavidherr I've been using .13 * ICUs as a check on my estimates using HHS reported deaths.

@DrSeaPerle Yes, Florida total COVID-19 deaths estimated based on TotalDeaths:ICUCensus ratio = 0.134

This ratio calculated using almost same method as this chart scaling: 17 (ICU census) / 126 (deaths) = 0.135 https://t.co/cEOkp3bw0x
@scottdavidherr Love seeing those low case numbers!
@scottdavidherr Is your estimated deaths based on ICUs?

3/9/2022 TECH NOTE: HHS Hospital Data

Tables show timeseries updates for last 8 days

Important: Last row in the HHS dataset is a placeholder for hospitals to update and doesn't have any meaningful data, should be disregarded
